name: Monster Miners
description:
✦
Monster Miners
by AlphabeticA
Inspired by the app Monster Merge

• Monsters mine rocks to make money
• Click the fast forward button to speed things up
• Merge monsters together to make better ones
• Buy new monsters in the store
• Higher level rocks are worth more

This was originally made by Alphabetica check him out here:

https://scratch.mit.edu/users/alphabetica/
